description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=2/3. Enjoy classic novels the way they were meant to be read: On your big screen television!  Over 25 complete classic works are at your fingertips in one digital collection including Sherlock Holmes, Alice in Wonderland, War and Peace, and many more.  With easy navigation, chapter jumping, advanced bookmarking and customizable font sizes, you’ll wish you could read every book like this!
